title: Halsey escapes to an empty carnival with Euphoria star Sydney Sweeney in music video for Graveyard
text:
She recently announced that a collection of new music is on its way.

And Halsey celebrated just one of the rumored 16 songs on her new album Manic with a moody video for Graveyard released on Tuesday afternoon.

The 25-year-old singer paraded around an empty carnival setup with Euphoria star Sydney Sweeney for the nearly four-minute clip.

Sing out loud: Halsey celebrated just one of the rumored 16 songs on her new album Manic with a moody video for Graveyard released on Tuesday afternoon

Halsey perched across a bed in a somber sitting during the opening clips of the song as flashbacks showed a ferris wheel lit up in the night sky.

She sat in a dark room with a pen and paper, drawing a character which transformed into real life.

Halsey — who's real name is Ashley Nicolette Frangipane — dressed like a '50s princess wearing a strapless blue dress with a full skirt.

Girls just want to have fun: The 25-year-old singer paraded around an empty carnival setup with Euphoria star Sydney Sweeney for the nearly four-minute clip

Cute: Halsey — who's real name is Ashley Nicolette Frangipane — dressed like a '50s princess wearing a strapless blue dress with a full skirt

Her co-star Sydney looked angelic in a matching pink number as the girls frolicked throughout the empty carnival together.

The pair were enamored with each other and danced around the vacant festival with a ferris wheel spinning in the background.

When Halsey retreated into an underground aquarium, Sweeney was soon lost and disappeared from the screen.

Stunning: Her co-star Sydney looked angelic in a matching pink number as the girls frolicked throughout the empty carnival together

Friends: The pair were enamored with each other and danced around the vacant festival with a ferris wheel spinning in the background

Splash: The Without Me songstress reappeared bursting through the water in a sheer white dress

The Without Me songstress reappeared bursting through the water in a sheer white dress.

She snaps to her senses and sits in a colorless bedroom, realizing it was her imagination at work as the video ends with Halsey holding an empty notepad.

Her third studio album is set for release on Jan. 17, 2020 and will also feature her new single Clementine.
description: The 25-year-old singer paraded around an empty carnival setup with Euphoria star Sydney Sweeney for the nearly four-minute clip.
